Name: The Drained Goddess
About the game: TUTORIAL&HINT: A manual is prepared for you in case you need some help. You can find it on the right column of your steam client library. DESCRIPTION The Drained Goddess is a first-person survival horror game achieved with CryEngine. It focuses on combat system and side story exploration. You will need to fight with many unique enemies and investigate the twisted fate of our main character. Finally you can put different endings to the story. Rich Enemies There are many unique featured enemies. Their behaviors and abilities are specialized. Rich Equipment You can get various unique equipment during the game, including melee weapons, thrown and magic spells. They have different attack styles and damage types. Exploration Most enemies are optional to fight with or even triggered. Some side stories will affect story endings. Flexible Difficulty Levels Puzzles and enemies in side stories are more difficult to deal with in general. Also you probably don't have enough resources to fight with all enemies easily. This will provide different experiences.
